snippet: Allan E. Parrish gets mixed up.
abstract: Allan E. Parrish gets mixed up.
lead_paragraph: TUESDAY'S PUZZLE - Happy Blogiversary! One year ago, my first Wordplay post went live, and life as I knew it has not been the same since. I went into detail about my start here the other day so I won't bore you with it again, but I would like to thank you all once again for being such an important part of the New York Times crossword world.
